pkgmetadata.longdescription: Light Use Efficiency Model to Estimate Biomass and YIELD with and Without Vapour Pressure Deficit // Contains LUE_BIOMASS(),LUE_BIOMASS_VPD(), LUE_YIELD() and LUE_YIELD_VPD() to estimate aboveground biomass and crop yield firstly by calculating the Absorbed Photosynthetically Active Radiation (APAR) and secondly the actual values of light use efficiency with and without vapour presure deficit Shi et al.(2007) doi:10.2134/agronj2006.0260.
